Articles.Content:
I don't know if this is a feature that is meant to be in the game or not but I would really like to see the command module dynamically change to the normal directional setting of up on the launchpad while being oriented in different directions in the VAB.

 

Can't make a drone satellite that maneuvers appropriately when it's not sitting perpendicular to the ground.
You can swap orientation in the wrench menu thing, don't know it's name.
